company.name: Venmo
company.summary: Venmo is a service that makes it easy, safe, and fun to pay your friends. Venmos iPhone and Android apps allow you to make and share payments with friends for rent, utilities, dinner, drinks, movies, concert tickets, birthdays, laughs, and anything else. Paying with your debit card or bank account is free, and you can transfer money from your Venmo account balance to your bank account overnigh
